'''Vu Bui''' is the Media Director of [[Mojang Studios]] and has held this position since October 2012.<ref name=linkedin>[https://www.linkedin.com/in/vubui/ Vu Bui on LinkedIn]</ref> He is known as a host in many Minecraft shows such as ''[[Minecraft Now]]'' (in some episodes)'', [[Minecraft Monthly]]''. And for Minecraft Live, he is known as the ''Host of the Deep Dig After Show'', the voice of [[Tiny Vu]], a miniaturized pixelated doppelgänger of himself featured in several promotional videos for the [[Community Vote|Mob Vote]] and such, and for being previously the ''[[Community Vote|Biome Vote/Mob Vote]] Correspondent'' before the dynamic's cancelation in 2024. He's also one of the Producers of [[A Minecraft Movie]] alongside Torfi Frans Olafsson.

Besides his work on Minecraft, Vu has also been the president of the charity group [[Block by Block]] since October 2015.<ref name=linkedin/> He shares a YouTube channel about photography with his wife [[Lydia Winters]].<ref>https://www.youtube.com/@LydiaAndVu</ref>

He is known to be of Vietnamese descent and has a brother named Lan Bui through his Instagram and Twitter posts.<ref>{{tweet|vubui|1313462665440829442}}</ref>
